MOV IOA, #
1
OUT #
0b00111000
OUT #
0b00001111
OUT #
0b00000110
OUT #
0b00000001

MOV IOA, #
2
OUT #
0b01001000
OUT #
0b01100001
OUT #
0b01101100
OUT #
0b01101100
OUT #
0b01101111
OUT #
0b10100000
OUT #
0b01100101
OUT #
0b01110010
OUT #
0b01110011
OUT #
0b01110100
OUT #
0b01101101
OUT #
0b01100001
OUT #
0b01101100
HLT
